meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by the production of four spores.
meanings.sent1: The tetrasporic algae released four spores during reproduction.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the tetrasporic plant to understand its spore production.
meanings.sent3: The tetrasporic mushrooms seemed to be having a spore party, inviting all their friends.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a tetrasporic wonderland, each plant a spore-producing marvel.
meanings.sent5: The tetrasporic process was like a synchronized dance of spore creation.

meanings.sent1: The tetrasporic organism had four spores inside its structure.
meanings.sent2: The tetrasporic capsule burst open, releasing its four spores into the air.
meanings.sent3: The tetrasporic fruit looked like it was juggling its four spores for fun.
meanings.sent4: The tetrasporic pattern on the leaf resembled a delicate arrangement of four spores.
meanings.sent5: The tetrasporic nature of the plant was evident in the precise arrangement of its spores.
